title: Vue 3 Masterclass: Build Production Apps
description: Master Vue 3 composition API and build enterprise-grade applications. Learn reactive state management, component patterns, and advanced composition techniques from industry experts.

title: Modern JavaScript ES2025 Bootcamp
description: Intensive 5-day bootcamp covering modern JavaScript ES2025 features, async/await patterns, decorators, and real-world development practices. Hands-on projects included.

title: Web Design Summit 2025
description: Connect with leading web designers and developers. Explore latest design trends, AI-powered design tools, responsive design strategies, and build your professional network.

title: Full-Stack Development with Nuxt 3
description: Build complete full-stack applications using Nuxt 3, auto-imports, composables, middleware, and API routes. Perfect for scaling your development skills.

title: Lightning-Fast Web: Performance Optimization Secrets
description: Discover techniques to make your websites blazingly fast. Learn about Core Web Vitals, code splitting, lazy loading, CDN strategies, and real user monitoring.

title: Design Systems & Component-Driven Development
description: Master creating scalable design systems. Learn design tokens, component libraries, accessibility standards, and implementing design-to-code workflows.

title: React 19 Advanced Patterns Workshop
description: Explore React 19's latest features including server components, streaming SSR, and advanced hooks patterns. Build performant, scalable React applications.

title: GraphQL & API Design: Enterprise Solutions
description: Build scalable APIs with GraphQL. Learn schema design, resolvers, authentication, caching strategies, and integrating GraphQL with modern frameworks.
